On this show, the contestants are going to have to do the auditions in front of three or four thousand people. This way we bring the audience into the audition process as well, they effectively become a fifth judge, Simon Cowell said. Video: Howard Stern signs autographs before David Letterman appearance Howard Stern first joked about David Letterman 's 2009 tabloid troubles by referencing his own experiences working at CBS. ''You had your scandal. Charlie Sheen has his scandal. They keep hiring you guys. Me, I got fired. They took me to court and sued me. What did I do wrong? I mentioned where I work... You guys are up to shenanigans I'm back stage looking over everyone going: ''Did you have sex with David Letterman ?'.''' Howard Stern was sued by CBS in 2006 when the company accused him of using his terrestrial radio air time to promote his new satellite radio gig at Sirius. News Washington Bureau The Environmental Protection Agency and Chrysler will announce a new research and development project next week in Debbie Stabenow Arbor. EPA Administrator Lisa Jackson will join Chrysler Group CEO Sergio Marchionne to announce a research and development project to explore and evaluate an innovative drivetrain technology for light duty vehicles, the EPA said in a statement. Advertisement The event will take place at the EPA National Vehicle and Fuel Emissions Laboratory. Chrysler has applied for billions of dollars in loans from the

charge is sufficient to drive the motor. ''In this hydraulic hybrid project, the Chrysler Group and EPA will evaluate and, hopefully, validate fuel-efficiency gains and greenhouse gas reductions,'' Sergio Marchionne said. One of the aims of Chrysler Group's integration efforts will be to meet driver expectations for smooth and quiet operation, so that Americans will want to buy and will enjoy driving vehicles with this technology. Speaking at the Pro Bowl, Reggie Wayne told reporters that seeing Peyton Manning throw 11 interceptions during a three-game losing streak was a shock. The main thing we realized, he's not immortal. He's real. He's not a machine. It goes to show you this game is so competitive, even the guys on top can hit a wall somewhere. In Philadelphia, Michael Vick not only hit the wall, he spent a couple of years behind them in a prison cell.
